ROMList.changelog:
* source side 
* VooC Charging enabled 
* Ancient CustomDoze Enabled 
* Added FaceUnlock

* Added support for realme X Lite (audio should work now).
* Enabled zygote preforking (Faster app launch).
* Inline with latest lineage-17.1 build for RMX1851.
* Bliss Upstream

* Added support for realme X Lite (audio should work now).
* Enabled zygote preforking (Faster app launch).
* Inline with latest lineage-17.1 build for RMX1851.
* CarbonROM Upstream

* Switch to qti bluetooth stack
 * fix dolby not work with bt headset
 * added prebuilt pixelgapps (no need to flash gapps)
 * gamemode improvements

* September Security patch
 * Proper model detection (supported models: RMX1851, RMX1853, RMX1855)
 * Realme settings improvements
 * Performance mode just like RUI High performance mode, works along game mode option inside Realme settings. (Disable it after gaming so that it will switch to balanced profile)
 * Game mode DND improvements
 * Added F2fs mount point
 * Added support for realme X Lite (audio should work now)
 * Enabled zygote preforking (Faster app launch)

* Added App Lock
 * October Security Patch
 * Updated vendor security patch
 * Updated build fingerprint and description
 * Updated Camera blobs
 * Switched to QTI Bluetooth Stack
 * SE Linux improvements
 * game mode tunings
 * Kernel upstream

OCT patch
 * Added moto Dolby atmos
 * Added Vooc Charging
 * Added toggle for Dolby (Turn on/off from Realme settings)
 * Included changes from latest FLOS
 * Kernel upstream
